contextId.information: the priests and Levites, not John (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_exclusive]])
When Jesus said "we," he was not including Nicodemus. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_exclusive]])
The pronoun "we" is exclusive. The Jewish leaders are speaking only of themselves. AT: "but we are following Moses!" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_exclusive]])
contextId.quote: but we are disciples of Moses
